resources.string:
Hello there! :)

 I am really glad you ended on this app. 
 My name is Ioana and this is my Graduation Theses.

 MotorRide is a Android Application destined for motorcycle riders. It can record your routes, by clicking on the Start button. It can also display the Instant Speed, during your ride and at the of your route it will give you a short overview on your just finished route.

 You can create an account and register to it.It helps you keep track over your routes.

 I hope you enjoy my MotorRide App.
 
 Be safe, 
 MotorRide
